Name: Impending Doom
Script: On Execute: screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); screenshake(); attack(d[;] FIRE); attack(d[;] ICE); attack(d[;] POISON); attack(d[;] WEAKEN); givedice(d);

Name: Gamma Curse
Script: On Execute: inflict(CURSE[;] 20); inflict(WEAKEN[;] 20); inflict(FIRE[;] 20); inflict(ICE[;] 20); inflict(LOCK[;] 20); inflict(SHOCK[;] 20); givedice(d);
